fields.title: The Shawshank Redemption
fields.description: A banker wrongly convicted of murder forms a life-changing friendship with a fellow inmate over two decades in prison.

fields.title: The Godfather
fields.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant youngest son.

fields.title: The Dark Knight
fields.description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham City into anarchy.

fields.title: Pulp Fiction
fields.description: Interconnected stories of crime and redemption in Los Angeles unfold in non-linear fashion.

fields.title: Schindler's List
fields.description: A German businessman saves over a thousand Jewish refugees during the Holocaust by employing them in his factories.

fields.title: Inception
fields.description: A skilled thief who steals secrets from dreams is offered a chance to have his criminal record erased if he can plant an idea in someone's mind.

fields.title: Fight Club
fields.description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club that evolves into something much more dangerous.

fields.title: Forrest Gump
fields.description: A simple man with a low IQ witnesses and unwittingly influences several defining historical events in 20th century America.

fields.title: The Matrix
fields.description: A computer hacker discovers that reality as he knows it is a simulation created by machines to subdue humanity.

fields.title: Goodfellas
fields.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, from his early days to his eventual downfall and cooperation with the FBI.

fields.title: The Silence of the Lambs
fields.description: A young FBI cadet seeks the advice of an imprisoned cannibalistic serial killer to catch another serial killer.

fields.title: Spirited Away
fields.description: A young girl becomes trapped in a mysterious spirit world and must find a way to free herself and her parents.

fields.title: Saving Private Ryan
fields.description: Following D-Day, a group of soldiers goes behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

fields.title: Interstellar
fields.description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to find a new home for humanity.

fields.title: The Green Mile
fields.description: A death row corrections officer discovers that one of his inmates has a mysterious supernatural gift.

fields.title: Se7en
fields.description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motifs.

fields.title: The Lion King
fields.description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after the murder of his father, only to return as an adult to reclaim his throne.

fields.title: Gladiator
fields.description: A betrayed Roman general fights his way back as a gladiator to avenge his family and challenge the corrupt emperor.

fields.title: The Departed
fields.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police try to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

fields.title: When Harry Met Sally
fields.description: Two friends grapple with the question of whether men and women can ever truly be just friends.

fields.title: Die Hard
fields.description: A New York cop battles terrorists who have seized a Los Angeles skyscraper during a Christmas party.

fields.title: The Shining
fields.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence drives the father into violent madness.

fields.title: Toy Story
fields.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened when a new spaceman toy arrives and becomes the favorite.

fields.title: The Prestige
fields.description: Two rival magicians engage in a bitter competition to create the ultimate stage illusion.

fields.title: Alien
fields.description: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly life form after investigating a distress signal.

fields.title: Back to the Future
fields.description: A teenager is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean and must make sure his parents fall in love.

fields.title: The Notebook
fields.description: A poor young man falls in love with a rich young woman, and their love endures across decades despite social differences.

fields.title: Superbad
fields.description: Two co-dependent high school seniors set out to score alcohol for a party to impress their crushes before graduation.

fields.title: Blade Runner 2049
fields.description: A young blade runner discovers a long-buried secret that leads him to track down a former blade runner who has been missing for thirty years.

fields.title: The Exorcist
fields.description: A mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter from demonic possession.

fields.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
fields.description: An adventurous archaeologist races against Nazis to find the legendary Ark of the Covenant.

fields.title: The Big Lebowski
fields.description: An easygoing bowler is drawn into a web of intrigue after being mistaken for a millionaire with the same name.

fields.title: Titanic
fields.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

fields.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
fields.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler with help from a drifter.

fields.title: Parasite
fields.description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family, with increasingly dark consequences.

fields.title: Get Out
fields.description: A young African-American man visits his white girlfriend's family estate and becomes ensnared in a horrifying secret.

fields.title: WALL-E
fields.description: A lone robot on a future deserted Earth discovers a new purpose in life when he meets a sleek search robot.

fields.title: The Princess Bride
fields.description: A young woman is kidnapped and her true love must rescue her from a scheming prince.

fields.title: Groundhog Day
fields.description: A weatherman finds himself reliving the same day over and over again in a small Pennsylvania town.

fields.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
fields.description: Humanity finds a mysterious monolith on the Moon and sends an expedition to Jupiter with the sentient computer HAL 9000.

fields.title: Zodiac
fields.description: A San Francisco cartoonist becomes obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac killer in a decades-long investigation.

fields.title: Pride & Prejudice
fields.description: A spirited young woman navigates society and falls for a wealthy but seemingly arrogant gentleman in Regency-era England.

fields.title: The Terminator
fields.description: A cyborg assassin is sent back in time to kill the mother of the future resistance leader.

fields.title: Psycho
fields.description: A secretary on the run checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

fields.title: Finding Nemo
fields.description: After his son is captured and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey across the ocean to bring him home.

fields.title: Jurassic Park
fields.description: A theme park with cloned dinosaurs turns deadly when the security systems fail and the creatures run free.

fields.title: The Usual Suspects
fields.description: A sole survivor tells the police his account of events that led him and his four fellow cons to a deadly shootout.

fields.title: Bridesmaids
fields.description: A woman's life unravels as she leads her best friend through the chaotic planning of her wedding.

fields.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
fields.description: A couple undergoes a procedure to erase each other from their memories after a painful breakup.

fields.title: Arrival
fields.description: A linguistics professor leads an elite team to interpret the language of extraterrestrial visitors who have landed around the world.

fields.title: No Country for Old Men
fields.description: A hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and is pursued by a relentless killer across the Texas desert.

fields.title: John Wick
fields.description: A retired hitman seeks vengeance against a crime lord's son who stole his car and killed his dog.

fields.title: It
fields.description: A group of young kids face their biggest fears when they confront an evil clown named Pennywise.

fields.title: Up
fields.description: An elderly widower ties thousands of balloons to his house and flies to South America, with a young stowaway aboard.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
fields.description: A hobbit inherits a powerful ring and sets out on an epic journey to destroy it in the fires of Mount Doom.

fields.title: Heat
fields.description: A group of professional bank robbers starts to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a clue.

fields.title: Airplane!
fields.description: A man afraid to fly must take over piloting a commercial airliner when the crew falls ill from food poisoning.

fields.title: Before Sunrise
fields.description: Two strangers meet on a train in Europe and spend one magical night walking through Vienna together.

fields.title: Ex Machina
fields.description: A programmer is selected to participate in an experiment to evaluate the human qualities of an advanced AI.

fields.title: Oldboy
fields.description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, a man is released and seeks to uncover the reason behind his captivity.

fields.title: Kill Bill: Volume 1
fields.description: A former assassin awakens from a coma and seeks revenge on her former colleagues who betrayed her.

fields.title: Hereditary
fields.description: A family is haunted by tragic and increasingly terrifying events after the death of their secretive grandmother.

fields.title: Coco
fields.description: A boy who dreams of becoming a musician enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-grandfather.

fields.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
fields.description: An archaeologist and his father embark on a quest to find the Holy Grail before the Nazis.

fields.title: City of God
fields.description: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths as one becomes a photographer and the other a drug dealer.

fields.title: The Hangover
fields.description: Three friends wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas with no memory of the previous night and must retrace their steps.

fields.title: La La Land
fields.description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

fields.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
fields.description: A cyborg is sent back in time to protect a young boy from a more advanced and deadly cyborg.

fields.title: The Thing
fields.description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

fields.title: Inside Out
fields.description: After young Riley is uprooted from her life, her emotions conflict on how best to navigate a new city and school.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
fields.description: The final battle for Middle-earth begins as Frodo and Sam approach Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring.

fields.title: Reservoir Dogs
fields.description: After a heist goes wrong, the surviving criminals try to find out which one of them is a police informant.

fields.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
fields.description: A pompous TV news anchor clashes with his new female co-anchor in 1970s San Diego.

fields.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
fields.description: A bad-boy is paid to date a shrewish girl so her younger sister can date, loosely based on Shakespeare's Taming of the Shrew.

fields.title: Dune
fields.description: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over a desert planet and its precious resource.

fields.title: Memento
fields.description: A man with short-term memory loss uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he believes killed his wife.

fields.title: The Avengers
fields.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop an alien invasion led by Thor's adoptive brother Loki.

fields.title: A Quiet Place
fields.description: A family must live in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound.

fields.title: Ratatouille
fields.description: A rat who dreams of becoming a great chef forms an unlikely partnership with a young kitchen worker in Paris.

fields.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
fields.description: A swashbuckling pirate teams up with a blacksmith to rescue a governor's daughter from cursed pirates.

fields.title: The Godfather Part II
fields.description: The early life of Vito Corleone in Sicily and his rise in New York intercuts with his son Michael's expanding criminal empire.

fields.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
fields.description: A legendary concierge at a famous hotel is framed for murder and must prove his innocence.

fields.title: Casablanca
fields.description: A cynical expatriate nightclub owner in Morocco must choose between love and helping a resistance leader escape.

fields.title: The Bourne Identity
fields.description: A man suffering from amnesia tries to discover his true identity while evading assassins.

fields.title: The Conjuring
fields.description: Paranormal investigators help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

fields.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
fields.description: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man and crosses paths with counterparts from other dimensions.

fields.title: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back
fields.description: The rebels face a devastating Imperial assault while Luke Skywalker trains with Jedi Master Yoda.

fields.title: Fargo
fields.description: A car salesman hires two criminals to kidnap his wife so he can collect the ransom from her wealthy father.

fields.title: Ghostbusters
fields.description: Three parapsychologists start a ghost-catching business in New York City.

fields.title: Moonlight
fields.description: A young man growing up in Miami deals with his identity and sexuality across three defining chapters of his life.

fields.title: Gravity
fields.description: Two astronauts struggle to survive after debris destroys their shuttle, leaving them stranded in space.

fields.title: Gone Girl
fields.description: A man becomes the prime suspect when his wife goes missing on their fifth wedding anniversary.

fields.title: Top Gun: Maverick
fields.description: A veteran fighter pilot must confront his past while training a group of graduates for a specialized mission.

fields.title: Midsommar
fields.description: A couple travels to a remote Swedish village for a midsummer festival that turns out to be a terrifying pagan cult.

fields.title: The Incredibles
fields.description: A family of superheroes is forced to hide their powers and live a quiet suburban life until a new villain emerges.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
fields.description: The fellowship is broken, and its members pursue their separate quests as the war for Middle-earth intensifies.

fields.title: Sicario
fields.description: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the war against drugs at the border.

fields.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
fields.description: King Arthur and his knights embark on a surreal quest for the Holy Grail, encountering absurd obstacles.

fields.title: 12 Angry Men
fields.description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

fields.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
fields.description: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure where she alone can save existence by exploring other universes.
